testcase.name: TC- 1
testcase.summary: Check whether proper field displayed on login page

step.expectedresults: 1. Username and Password fields should be displayed with text box. 2. Login button should be displayed. 3. Also 'Forgot your username or password?' link should be displayed. 4.At the right side, Two sub tabs 'Additional Information' and 'Admissions' should be displayed and default selected tab as 'Additional Information '

testcase.name: TC- 2
testcase.summary: Check whether an alert message displayed on clicking login button without entering 'username' and 'password'.

step.expectedresults: Alert message saying “User name is required. Password is required.” should be displayed with 'OK' button

testcase.name: TC- 3
testcase.summary: Check whether alert message gets disappear on clicking 'OK' button.
